name: CondaEnvironment
description: Create and activate a Conda environment
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: environmentName
inputs.label: Environment name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Conda environment to create and activate.

inputs.name: packageSpecs
inputs.label: Package specs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Space-delimited list of packages to install when creating the environment.

inputs.name: updateConda
inputs.label: Update to the latest Conda
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update Conda to the latest version. This applies to the Conda installation found in `PATH` or at the path specified by the `CONDA` environment variable.

inputs.name: createOptions
inputs.label: Environment creation options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Space-delimited list of other options to pass to the `conda create` command.

inputs.name: cleanEnvironment
inputs.label: Clean the environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete the environment and recreate it if it already exists. If not selected, the task will reactivate an existing environment.
